item.title: CoreUI 3k+ icons set ‚Äì why the ‚Ä¶ did we do this?!
item.description: Webpage or an app interface means nothing if it‚Äôs not glued with sexy set of icons. You know it best. So to be honest, we‚Äôve got an answer for above question. But‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs always a ‚Äúbut‚Äù üòâ You may ask why we let more than 3000 icons to be downloaded for free? X-mas gift, Black Friday in December, New Year‚Äôs madness? No way ‚Äì from now on, you can use CoreUI icons for free. We‚Äôre open source, so it should be for free. Save your time and drag them in your design.

item.title: Laravel rockz?
item.description: You‚Äôve been asking us to introduce CoreUI for #Laravel and as you know ‚Äì your wish is our command üòâ, so here it is: https://coreui.io/laravel/ You can check both Free and PRO versions. What‚Äôs inside? Saying a bunch of responsive, customizable, and reusable components you need to create modern, beautiful, responsive apps is saying (almost) nothing.

item.title: Are you ready for CoreUI 3.0?
item.description:
The beta version has just been released.

Some say‚Ä¶ üòâ that CoreUI admin template is one of the most popular open-source admin panel template. Some may ask ‚Äì why? Because it delivers all responsive, customizable, and reusable components, you might need to create simply beautiful & responsive apps. But the beauty would be nothing without time-to-market. So please cordially welcome CoreUI 3.0 (beta).

item.title: Leave well alone?
item.description: We believe that we all know that sentence, but to be honest - like humans, companies change over time and, when it does, a brand redesign becomes necessary. We bet you noticed latest changes in our design and if you‚Äôre interested in more detailed information, pls read this post.

item.title: What‚Äôs new and updated in CoreUI 3
item.description: Version 3 has been re-written and re-designed completely from scratch. Here are the key changes in v3:

item.title: Bootstrap Icons
item.description: Bootstrap 4 doesn‚Äôt include an icon library by default, that’s why many developers looking for best icons. Where you can find awesome Bootstrap Icons for your project?

item.title: Migration from Bootstrap 3 to Bootstrap 4
item.description: Bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the entire project. The most notable changes are summarized below, followed by more specific changes to relevant components.

item.title: How to upgrade Bootstrap 4 alpha 6 to Bootstrap 4 beta
item.description: After two years in the making, Bootstrap creators finally released first beta of Bootstrap 4. In latest version of Bootstrap 4 more then 650 files was changed, 67k lines was added, and 82k lines was deleted.

item.description: Bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the entire project. The most notable changes are summarized below, followed by more specific changes to relevant components.

item.title: What's new in Bootstrap 4 ?
item.description: Bootstrap 4 is just round the corner. Bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the entire project. Here is list of major changes in latest version of Bootstrap.

item.title: Bootstrap 3.0.2 and 3.0.1 - right direction?
item.description: There‚Äôs no discussion that, Bootstrap is one of the most popular responsive frameworks available, since Twitter released it in 2011. Thanks to an extensive library of cutting edge components, add-ons and plugins it enables fresh ideas and unconventional approach to every next web project. So there‚Äôs no wonder then, that not more than a week ago we‚Äôve heard about Bootstrap 3.0.1, and just two days ago we‚Äôve got Bootstrap 3.0.2. But as our dear old grannies used to say: never too much of a good thing‚Ä¶

item.title: Bootstrap ‚Äì unlimited responsive template?
item.description: Show me your cards (not, not Bootstrap themes yet)‚Ä¶ As we‚Äôre all waiting for top mobile devices premieres, I bet we‚Äôre all satisfied right now. Apple showed its iPhone 5c and iPhone 5s ‚Äì for the first time in history mobile device has been equipped with 64 bit CPU ‚Äì future yet to come? On the other side, Samsung launched its Gear and Note III during IFA fair trade in Berlin

item.title: Genius Bootstrap Admin Template
item.description: We introduced our Genius Bootstrap Admin Template. But does the name oblige? If we look at some of the features like Bootstrap 3.0.0, write with LESS and almost 1500 icon (among them Glyphicons PRO), you can easily say that Genius Bootstrap can be(come) Einstein in the world of Bootstrap templates.
